response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for those who appreciate its true worth. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $500,000, which I believe reflects its true value and allows for a fair transaction. Should you choose to accept this offer, it will not only secure your possession of this remarkable item but also ensure a significant investment in its future potential. If you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 500000}
